titles.title: Honoring and thanking United States Capitol Police Assistant Chief of Police James Patrick Rohan on the occasion of his retirement.
Honoring and thanking United States Capitol Police Assistant Chief of Police James Patrick Rohan on the occasion of his retirement.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: Declares that the House of Representatives honors and thanks James Patrick Rohan and his family on the occasion of his retirement for a lifelong professional commitment of service to the U.S. Capitol Police and of ensuring the safety and security of Congress.
